ascend_skill.desc:
Kitazato has 2 modes, Doctor and Ripper, and the properties of his skills change depending on the mode. He starts in Doctor mode.
Doctor: Each time Kitazato deals damage with a skill, there is a 70% chance to inflict 1 Bleed stack on the target. When a foe with Bleed is defeated, its Bleed stacks are passed on to the foe with the highest HP. He can also spend SP to use Physical skills.
Ripper: When Kitazato uses a skill, inflict 1 Rending stack for every 3 Bleed stacks on the target.
Bleed: Each turn, deal Almighty damage equal to 1% of the target's max HP + Physical damage equal to 4% of Kitazato's Attack. This effect lasts for 4 turns and stacks up to 10 times.
Rending: Deal Physical damage based on Kitazato's Attack and Nightfall's skill level (this damage cannot deal critical hits or Down Point damage).
ascend_skill.name: Mortal Responsibility

ascend_skill.desc:
In Doctor mode, the first time skill damage is dealt to each foe, inflict 5 more Bleed stacks on the target.
In Ripper mode, when using a skill on a foe, increase that skill's damage based on the number of debuffs on the target. When they are inflicted with 10 or more debuffs, maximize this effect and increase skill damage up to 80%.
Also, multiply Bleed's Almighty damage by 1.5.
ascend_skill.name: Abdominal Incisions

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the Attack multiplier of Rending by 35% of Kitazato's Attack. Restore Kitazato's HP by 2% of Rending damage dealt (up to Kitazato's Lv. Ã— 15 + 300 each turn).
ascend_skill.name: Forbidden Transfusion

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Moonlit Scalpel / Midnight Surgery and Thief Tactics by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Master of the Scalpel

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase Highlight damage by 8% for each Bleed stack inflicted on the target.
ascend_skill.name: Bloody Bacchanal

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Crimson Operation / Pathology and Nightfall by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Razor-Sharp Focus

ascend_skill.desc:
Increase the maximum stacks of Bleed to 13. Also, each foe will always be inflicted with 3 stacks of Bleed.
When using Midnight Surgery in Ripper mode, do not remove the target's Bleed stacks. Also evolve Rending effects to Killing Frenzy, increase damage by 100%, and deal 50% damage to all other foes. Killing Frenzy can activate effects from Rending with all skills.
ascend_skill.name: Great Doctor

highlight_skill.desc:
Switch to Doctor mode and immediately inflict 5 Bleed stacks on 1 foe.
Then, immediately switch to Ripper mode and deal Physical damage to the target equal to 492.8%/543.3%/523.1%/573.6% of Attack (can activate Rending effects).
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc: Doctor mode: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 47.3%/52.2%/50.2%/55.1% of Attack (4 hits) and inflict 1 Bleed stack.  Ripper mode: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 251.7%/277.5%/267.2%/292.9% of Attack, then remove 2 Bleed stacks from the target (can activate Rending effects).
normal_skill.name: Moonlit Scalpel / Midnight Surgery

normal_skill.desc:
Doctor mode: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 84.2%/92.9%/89.4%/98.0% of Attack (2 hits). At the same time, activate Bleed damage and reset the turn duration of the target's Bleed stacks 1 time.
Ripper mode: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 251.7%/277.5%/267.2%/292.9% of Attack. For each Bleed stack on the target, increase the damage of Rending activated by them and this skill by 2%, then remove all Bleed stacks from the target (can activate Rending effects).
normal_skill.name: Crimson Operation / Pathology

normal_skill.desc:
Switch to Ripper mode and change Kitazato's skills (can be activated when any foe has 7 or more Bleed stacks).
When using skills in this mode, for every 3 Bleed stacks on the target, inflict 1 Rending stack (Physical damage equal to 66.7%/73.5%/70.8%/77.6% of Attack).
After using this skill, Kitazato can use other skills and switches to Doctor mode at the end of the turn.
normal_skill.name: Nightfall

passive_skill.desc: For every 30% of the user's ailment accuracy, increase Physical damage dealt from Bleed by 4% of the user's Attack (up to 90% of ailment accuracy).
passive_skill.name: Hideous Mask

passive_skill.desc:
When in Doctor mode, increase ailment accuracy by 36%.
When in Ripper mode, increase pierce rate by 21%.
passive_skill.name: Drawn Blade
